block.p: Common * Enterprise Systems Inc., Wheeling, Ill., filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission to sell 2.35 million shares in an initial public offering. Robertson, Stephens will be the lead underwriter.

Common * Enterprise Systems Inc., Wheeling, Ill., filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission to sell 2.35 million shares in an initial public offering. Robertson, Stephens will be the lead underwriter.

* First Merchants Acceptance Corp., Deerfield, Ill., filed to sell 3.2 million shares. Salomon Brothers Inc. will be the lead underwriter. * Lifecore Biomedical Inc., Chaska, Minn., filed to sell 2.2 million shares. Piper Jaffray Inc. will be the lead underwriter. * Ocal Inc., Van Nuys, Calif., filed to sell 1 million shares in an initial public offering. * Tylan General Inc., San Diego, filed to sell 2.55 million shares. Hambrecht & Quist will be the lead underwriter.
